text: Christopher Eccleston (born 16 February 1964) is an English actor. He played the Ninth Doctor on Doctor Who in 2005. Before playing the doctor, he played the Son of God in The Second Coming. He has acted in movies, such as Let Him Have It, Shallow Grave, and Gone in 60 Seconds. Eccleston is an atheist.Accused ==References== ==Other websites== * Fan site * Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:English atheists Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:1964 births Category:Living people
title: Christopher Eccleston
